item.description:
GAME TIME!!!!

Let's jam together onto our huge sofa to watch the big game!


Kick off is at 6.30 so we can hang out a bit before hand watching pregame coverage and snacking on some great food.

This is a POT LUCK so bring some good food.
Suggestions:
Chili
Nachos
7 layer dip
Cheese and Crackers
chips and dip
hot hor dourves (we can cook them in our oven here)
cookies
brownies

BYOB- we will have soda, water, and iced tea but if you want some beer or wine bring some.


Fee for meetup is $2 per couple.
The fee covers the cost to run the meetup website

19 Abbottsford RD
Brookline MA

617 406 9696
item.how_to_find_us: Green House on the Right, Entrance is in the back
item.name: Superbowl XLIV-
